page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The law and order in our village consists of a small police station which is part of the West Mercia Constabulary. This station covers a number of villages and each policeman visits our station although it is not manned 24 hours a day. At the station there are cells to hold any prisoners. The Magistrates Court is over the road from the Police Station. The Court meets every other Monday, sometimes it sits at night for serious cases such as drugs. Instead of a jury there are three Justices of the Peace.
